profile.ask_citizenship: Tell us your citizenship. Use country name or code.
profile.ask_phone: Share your phone number via button or skip
profile.enter_phone: Send your phone number in international format
profile.ask_expiry: Enter migration card expiry date DD.MM.YYYY
profile.saved: Data saved. We will remind you 30 days before expiration and then weekly.
notifications.expiring: Migration card expires on {date}. Please extend it.
notifications.paused: Got it, reminders are paused. Please send the new expiry date after extension.
notifications.admin_extended: Admin marked your migration card as extended. You can pick up the document.
notifications.travel_check: Have you left Russia after the last extension?
notifications.travel_recorded: Answer saved. Update the migration card date if needed.
commands.renew: Provide a new migration card expiry date DD.MM.YYYY
